LanguageData.ArachnaeBase_Race_Scavenger.label: Arachnae Scavenger Species
LanguageData.ArachnaeBase_Race_Scavenger.description: A type of Arachnae auxiliary bug with low intelligence that can perform farming and harvesting tasks, but will meet its end after a short time.
LanguageData.ArachnaeBase_Race_Scavenger.comps.CompMe: This special Arachnae auxiliary bug is on a path to death from the moment it is born—that's how short its lifespan is.
LanguageData.ArachnaeBase_Race_HardJaw.label: Arachnae Hard-Jaw Species
LanguageData.ArachnaeBase_Race_HardJaw.description: A type of Arachnae auxiliary bug with low intelligence that can handle mining tasks, but will meet its end after a short time.
LanguageData.ArachnaeBase_Race_HardJaw.comps.CompMech: This special Arachnae auxiliary bug is on a path to death from the moment it is born—that's how short its lifespan is.
LanguageData.ArachnaeBase_Race_Maid.label: Arachnae Domestic Species
LanguageData.ArachnaeBase_Race_Maid.description: A type of Arachnae auxiliary bug with low intelligence that can perform cleaning and hauling tasks, but will meet its end after a short time.
LanguageData.ArachnaeBase_Race_Maid.comps.CompMechPow: This special Arachnae auxiliary bug is on a path to death from the moment it is born—that's how short its lifespan is.
LanguageData.ArachnaeBase_Race_Maid.tools.head.label: Head
